Identification_Area.title: Mars 2020 SuperCam VIS IRSpec CP2 Spectra

Modification_Detail.description: Enhanced status flags, corrected satuaration flags and added standard diviation to quality flag.
Corrected Saturation Contents in Quality Table

geom:Geometry_Lander.geom:description: Geometry as reported by the spacecraft in telemetry

Header.name: ODL LABEL HEADER
Header.description: FITS header for ODL Label Table

Table_Binary.name: TIMELINE TABLE
Table_Binary.description: Timeline Table: I-commands and their arguments

Field_Binary.name: MS_SINCE_LAST_SYNC
Field_Binary.description: SCLK time Sync

Field_Binary.name: CMD_NAME
Field_Binary.description: I-Command

Field_Binary.name: OPCODE
Field_Binary.description: Operation code

Field_Binary.name: TYPE
Field_Binary.description: Command or data

Field_Binary.name: DATA_LENGTH
Field_Binary.description: Size of data to follow

Field_Binary.name: ARGS
Field_Binary.description: Arguments to icommand

Field_Binary.name: DATA
Field_Binary.description: Data returned from icommand

Header.name: MU SOH HEADER
Header.description: FITS header for Mast Unit State of Health Table

Table_Binary.name: MU SOH TABLE
Table_Binary.description: Mast Unit State of Health Table

Field_Binary.name: MU_MS_OFFSET
Field_Binary.description: Offset from SCLK time sync

Field_Binary.name: 00_LASER_OSC1_TEMP
Field_Binary.description: Main thermal sensor for the Laser stack

Field_Binary.name: 01_LASER_OSC2_TEMP
Field_Binary.description: Redundant thermal sensor for the Laser stack

Field_Binary.name: 02_LASER_DOUB1_TEMP
Field_Binary.description: Main thermal sensor for the Laser stack

Field_Binary.name: 03_LASER_DOUB2_TEMP
Field_Binary.description: Redundant thermal sensor for the Laser stack

Field_Binary.name: 04_LASER_15V
Field_Binary.description: Laser 15V limiter sec voltage (close to 0 from OFF/15V when ON)

Field_Binary.name: 05_LASER_HV
Field_Binary.description: Laser High Voltage HK (close to 20V when OFF, 1200V when ON)

Field_Binary.name: 06_LASER_LIMITER_TEMP
Field_Binary.description: Laser board thermal sensor closed to the limiter (hot case)

Field_Binary.name: 07_DPU_MOTOR_DRIVER_TEMP
Field_Binary.description: DPU board thermal sensor on Motor Driver (hot case)

Field_Binary.name: 08_DPU_FPGA_TEMP
Field_Binary.description: DPU board thermal sensor on DPU

Field_Binary.name: 09_VREF_+2.5V
Field_Binary.description: 2.5V reference voltage

Field_Binary.name: 10_+1.5V
Field_Binary.description: 1.5V FPGA core voltage

Field_Binary.name: 11_+3.3V
Field_Binary.description: 3.3V FPGA I/O voltage

Field_Binary.name: 12_MOTOR_TEMPERATURE
Field_Binary.description: Thermal sensor inside the Motor (hot case)

Field_Binary.name: 13_PRIMARY_MIRROR_TEMP
Field_Binary.description: Reference thermal sensor for the AFT range check (on the bench now)

Field_Binary.name: 14_CWL_PD_CURRENT
Field_Binary.description: Compensation current of the CWL

Field_Binary.name: 15_MICRO_TEMP
Field_Binary.description: Thermal sensor inside the Microphone finger when MICRO ON

Field_Binary.name: 16_CWL_TEMP
Field_Binary.description: Thermal sensor used for CWL heater control

Field_Binary.name: 17_+3.3_IRS
Field_Binary.description: 3.3V IRS voltage (4.3V when IRS TEC OFF, 3.3V when IRS TEC ON)

Field_Binary.name: 18_+20V_RF_IRS
Field_Binary.description: 20V IRS voltage (20V when IRS TEC N DCDC ON)

Field_Binary.name: 19_+5V_RF_IRS
Field_Binary.description: 5V IRS voltage

Field_Binary.name: 20_-5V_RF_IRS
Field_Binary.description: -5V IRS Voltage

Field_Binary.name: 21_+5V_DT_IRS
Field_Binary.description: 8V IRS Voltage

Field_Binary.name: 22_-5V_DT_IRS
Field_Binary.description: -8V IRS Voltage

Field_Binary.name: 23_LVPS_BOARD_TEMP
Field_Binary.description: Thermal sensor on the LVPS board (hot case)

Field_Binary.name: 24_PRIMARY_CURRENT
Field_Binary.description: 28V current measured on the LVPS board

Field_Binary.name: 25_IRS_HK_TEMP_AOTF
Field_Binary.description: AOTF temperature (saturated at -51C)

Field_Binary.name: 26_IRS_HK_TEMP_HOT_TEC
Field_Binary.description: Hot side of TEC temperature (saturated at -51C)

Field_Binary.name: 27_IRS_HK_TEMP_BOARD
Field_Binary.description: Thermal sensor on the IRBoard (saturated at -51C)

Field_Binary.name: 28_IRS_HK_TEMP_DET
Field_Binary.description: TEC cold side temperature (saturated at -51C)

Field_Binary.name: 29_REMAINING_LASER_PULSES
Field_Binary.description: Number of remaining shots

Field_Binary.name: 30_ON/OFF_SHUTTER
Field_Binary.description: 0 = shutter is not activited, 1 = shutter is activated

Field_Binary.name: 31_ON/OFF_LIMITER
Field_Binary.description: 0 = Laser board Limiter OFF, 1 = Laser board Limiter ON

Field_Binary.name: 32_ON/OFF_HIGH_VOLTAGE_15_V
Field_Binary.description: 0 = Laser board +15V OFF, 1 = Laser board +15V ON

Field_Binary.name: 33_ON/OFF_MICROPHONE
Field_Binary.description: 0 = Microphone OFF, 1 = Microphone ON

Field_Binary.name: 34_ON/OFF_RMI
Field_Binary.description: 0 = RMI OFF, 1 = RMI ON

Field_Binary.name: 35_ON/OFF_DC/DC
Field_Binary.description: 0 = Microphone OFF, 1 = Microphone ON

Field_Binary.name: 36_ON/OFF_HEATER_DOUBLER_LASER
Field_Binary.description: 0 = heater doubler laser OFF, 1= heater doubler laser ON

Field_Binary.name: 37_ON/OFF_HEATER_STACK_LASER
Field_Binary.description: 0 = heater stack laser OFF, 1= heater stack laser ON

Field_Binary.name: 38_ON/OFF_HEATER_CWL
Field_Binary.description: 0 = heater CWL OFF, 1 = heater CWL ON

Field_Binary.name: 39_HEATER_DOUBLER_RECEIVED
Field_Binary.description: 0 = Doubler setpoint not reached, 1 = Doubler setpoint reached

Field_Binary.name: 40_HEATER_STACK_RECEIVED
Field_Binary.description: 0 = Stack setpoint not reached, 1 = Stack setpoint reached

Field_Binary.name: 41_HEATER_CWL_RECEIVED
Field_Binary.description: 0 = CWL setpoint not reached, 1 = CWL setpoint reached

Field_Binary.name: 42_ON/OFF_TEC_IR
Field_Binary.description: 0 = nominal photodiode (DET1), 1 = redundant photodiode(DET2)

Field_Binary.name: 43_TEC_IR_READY
Field_Binary.description: 0 = TEC is OFF, 1 = TEC is ON

Field_Binary.name: 44_IRS_MEAS_ONGOING
Field_Binary.description: 0 = TEC temp setpoint not reached, 1 = TEC temp setpoint reached

Field_Binary.name: 45_IR_DET_SEL
Field_Binary.description: 0 = IRS Measurement ongoing, 1 = IRS Measurement done

Field_Binary.name: 46_MOTOR_DRIVER_CIRCUIT_THERMAL_FLAG
Field_Binary.description: To be discussed, watchdog † implmenter dans DPU MU??

Field_Binary.name: 47_AF_GAIN_STATUS_MSB
Field_Binary.description: AF gain status_MSB

Field_Binary.name: 48_AF_GAIN_STATUS_LSB
Field_Binary.description: AF gain status_LSB

Field_Binary.name: 49_ON/OFF_CWL
Field_Binary.description: 0 = CWL is not turn OFF, 1 = CWl is turn ON

Field_Binary.name: 50_ON/OFF_CWL_MODULATION
Field_Binary.description: 0 = no modulation of CWL, 1 = modulation of CWL

Field_Binary.name: 51_ON/OFF_MOTOR_DRIVER
Field_Binary.description: 0 = Motor driver is OFF, 1 = Motor driver is ON

Field_Binary.name: 52_INFINITE_LIMIT_SWITCH_STATUS
Field_Binary.description: 0 = Infinite switch not reached, 1 = Infinite switch reached

Field_Binary.name: 53_CLOSE_LIMIT_SWITCH_STATUS
Field_Binary.description: 0 = Close switch not reached, 1 = Close switch reached

Field_Binary.description: 1.5V FPGA core voltage

Field_Binary.description: Thermal sensor inside the Motor (hot case)

Field_Binary.description: Compensation current of the CWL

Field_Binary.name: C15_MICRO_TEMP
Field_Binary.description: Thermal sensor inside the Microphone finger when MICRO ON

Field_Binary.name: C16_CWL_TEMP
Field_Binary.description: Thermal sensor used for CWL heater control

Field_Binary.name: C17_+3.3_IRS
Field_Binary.description: 3.3V IRS voltage (4.3V when IRS TEC OFF, 3.3V when IRS TEC ON)

Field_Binary.name: C18_+20V_RF_IRS
Field_Binary.description: 20V IRS voltage (20V when IRS TEC N DCDC ON)

Header.name: BU SOH HEADER
Header.description: FITS header for Body Unit State of Health Table

Table_Binary.name: BU SOH TABLE
Table_Binary.description: Body Unit State of Health Table

Field_Binary.name: BU_MS_OFFSET
Field_Binary.description: Millisecond offset time from sclk

Field_Binary.name: 00_TLM_FORMAT_VERSION_(CMD_DICT_VERSION)
Field_Binary.description: I-Command Dictionary version

Field_Binary.name: 01_LAST_BIST_RESULT
Field_Binary.description: Last BU BIST result

Field_Binary.name: 02_CURRENT_STATUS_FLAGS
Field_Binary.description: Current Status Flag state

Field_Binary.name: 03_BOOT_BANK_SELECTED
Field_Binary.description: MRAM iFSW boot bank selected by Init discretes. 0 = Bank A, 1 = Bank B

Field_Binary.name: 04_BOOT_BANK_ACTUAL
Field_Binary.description: MRAM iFSW boot bank that was actually used to boot the instrument. 0 = Bank A, 1 = Bank B

Field_Binary.name: 05_COMMANDS_RECEIVED
Field_Binary.description: Number of i-commands sent to the instrument

Field_Binary.name: 06_COMMANDS_COMPLETED
Field_Binary.description: Number of i-commands successfully completed (not rejected)

Field_Binary.name: 07_COMMANDS_REJECTED
Field_Binary.description: Number of i-commands rejected by the instrument

Field_Binary.name: 08_NUMBER_OF_ERROR_LOG_ENTRIES_SINCE_BOOT
Field_Binary.description: A non-zero value indicates that an error has occurred since the instrument was powered on

Field_Binary.name: 09_BANK_A_KERNEL_CALCULATED_CHECKSUM_-_NV
Field_Binary.description: Checksum of the MRAM iFSW Bank A kernel

Field_Binary.name: 10_BANK_A_APPLICATION_CALCULATED_CHECKSUM_-_NV
Field_Binary.description: Checksum of the MRAM iFSW Bank A application

Field_Binary.name: 11_BANK_B_KERNEL_CALCULATED_CHECKSUM_-_NV
Field_Binary.description: Checksum of the MRAM iFSW Bank B kernel

Field_Binary.name: 12_BANK_B_APPLICATION_CALCULATED_CHECKSUM_-_NV
Field_Binary.description: Checksum of the MRAM iFSW Bank B application

Field_Binary.name: 13_RCE_COMM_SIDE
Field_Binary.description: Indicates which RCE is active 0 = RCE B, 1 = RCE A

Field_Binary.name: 14_SPACEWIRE_COMM_ERROR_COUNT_-_NV
Field_Binary.description: Nonvolatile counter of the number of SpaceWire errors, indicating problems on the spectrometer or MU HSS intefaces

Field_Binary.name: 15_LAST_SPACEWIRE_ERROR_STATUS_REGISTER
Field_Binary.description: A copy of the SpaceWire error status register from the Leon3FT

Field_Binary.name: 16_SINGLE_BIT_MRAM_MEMORY_ERRORS_-_NV
Field_Binary.description: Nonvolatile counter of the number of single-bit (correctable) MRAM EDAC errors

Field_Binary.name: 17_SINGLE_BIT_SDRAM_MEMORY_ERRORS_-_NV
Field_Binary.description: Nonvolatile counter of the number of single-bit (correctable) SDRAM EDAC errors

Field_Binary.name: 18_LAST_SINGLE_BIT_MEMORY_ADDRESS
Field_Binary.description: Last error memory address from Leon3FT EDAC

Field_Binary.name: 19_SOFTWARE_VERSION
Field_Binary.description: iFSW version number

Field_Binary.name: 20_PULSES_ID_REG
Field_Binary.description: Copy of CNDH FPGA pulses register, used to pulse bits in the register for one clock cycle

Field_Binary.name: 21_ROVER_HSS_TX_WD_CNT_REG
Field_Binary.description: Copy of CNDH FPGA control register, the data to be transmitted on the MU HSS link

Field_Binary.name: 22_IRQ_CLR_REG
Field_Binary.description: Copy of CNDH FPGA control register, the interrupt clear register

Field_Binary.name: 23_ROVER_HSS_CNTRL_REG
Field_Binary.description: Copy of CNDH FPGA control register, the RCE interface control bits

Field_Binary.name: 24_ROVER_HSS_TX_REG
Field_Binary.description: Copy of CNDH FPGA control register, the data to be transmitted to the RCE

Field_Binary.name: 25_IRQ_EN_REG
Field_Binary.description: Copy of CNDH FPGA control register, the interrupt enable register

Field_Binary.name: 26_UART_TX_DATA_CNTRL_REG
Field_Binary.description: Copy of CNDH FPGA control register, the data to be trasmitted to the MU on the UART link

Field_Binary.name: 27_UART_CNTRL_REG
Field_Binary.description: Copy of CNDH FPGA control register, the MU UART link control register

Field_Binary.name: 28_LVPS_CTRL_REG
Field_Binary.description: Copy of CNDH FPGA control register, the bits to enable/disable the TEC and MU power relays

Field_Binary.name: 29_MRAM_CNTRL_REG
Field_Binary.description: Copy of CNDH FPGA control register, containing write enable bits for the CNDH MRAMs

Field_Binary.name: 30_LED_REG
Field_Binary.description: Copy of CNDH FPGA control register, on EDU and TBU units, this enables LEDs on the CNDH for debug purposes

Field_Binary.name: 31_INT_TIME_REG
Field_Binary.description: Copy of CNDH FPGA control register, test register for intensifier shutter control

Field_Binary.name: 32_NSPS_REG
Field_Binary.description: Copy of CNDH FPGA control register, number of shots per spectra

Field_Binary.name: 33_LZR_REP_RATE_REG
Field_Binary.description: Copy of CNDH FPGA control register, laser rep rate in units of system clock

Field_Binary.name: 34_SPW_CTRL_REG
Field_Binary.description: Copy of CNDH FPGA control register, SpaceWire control register for MU HSS interface

Field_Binary.name: 35_TEST_CTRL_REG
Field_Binary.description: Copy of CNDH FPGA control register, used as test register and attached to TEST_STAT_REG

Field_Binary.name: 36_MU_HSS_EMU_REG
Field_Binary.description: HSS_not_used

Field_Binary.name: 37_NUM_SPECTRA_REG
Field_Binary.description: Copy of CNDH FPGA control register, number of spectra to collect

Field_Binary.name: 38_HVPS_DLY_REG
Field_Binary.description: Copy of CNDH FPGA control register, number of 10ns steps to delay from MU trigger input to intensifier shutter open time

Field_Binary.name: 39_HVPS_DUR_REG
Field_Binary.description: Copy of CNDH FPGA control register, number of 10ns steps to keep intensifier shutter open

Field_Binary.name: 40_STATUS0_REG
Field_Binary.description: Copy of CNDH FPGA status register, contains boot bank select bit the status of inits received

Field_Binary.name: 41_IRQ_STAT_REG
Field_Binary.description: Copy of CNDH FPGA status register, interrupt status register, same bits as control register

Field_Binary.name: 42_ROVER_HSS_FRAME_STAT_REG
Field_Binary.description: Copy of CNDH FPGA status register, RCE HSS RX interface data

Field_Binary.name: 43_UART_STAT_REG
Field_Binary.description: Copy of CNDH FPGA status register, MU status register bits

Field_Binary.name: 44_ROVER_HSS_STAT_REG
Field_Binary.description: Copy of CNDH FPGA status register, RCE HSS TX and RX FIFO status bits

Field_Binary.name: 45_SPW_STAT_REG
Field_Binary.description: Copy of CNDH FPGA status register, MU HSS SpaceWire interface status bits

Field_Binary.name: 46_CNDH_PCB_TEMP
Field_Binary.description: Temperature of the CNDH PCB, usually the warmest part of the BU EBOX

Field_Binary.name: 47_CNDH_1_2_V
Field_Binary.description: 1.2v monitor on the CNDH, used for Leon3FT processor core

Field_Binary.name: 48_CNDH_LVPS_TEMP
Field_Binary.description: Temperature of the LVPS PCB

Field_Binary.name: 49_CNDH_3_3_V
Field_Binary.description: 3.3v monitor on the CNDH, main digital supply on CNDH and SE

Field_Binary.name: 50_CNDH_VUI_UV_SPECT_TEMP
Field_Binary.description: Temperature of the reflection spectrometer housing

Field_Binary.name: 51_CNDH_NEG_15_V
Field_Binary.description: -15v monitor on the CNDH, used on SE and HVPS

Field_Binary.name: 52_CNDH_15_V
Field_Binary.description: 15v monitor on the CNDH, used on CNDH, SE, and HVPS

Field_Binary.name: 53_CNDH_1_5_V
Field_Binary.description: 1.2v monitor on the CNDH, used for FPGA core

Field_Binary.name: 54_TEST_STAT_REG
Field_Binary.description: Copy of CNDH status register, attached to TEST_CTRL_REG

Field_Binary.name: 55_IDENTITY_STAT_REG
Field_Binary.description: Copy of CNDH status register, reports model number

Field_Binary.name: 56_TEST2_STAT_REG
Field_Binary.description: Copy of CNDH status register, attached to TEST_CTRL_REG

Field_Binary.name: 57_MISSED_PULSE_REG
Field_Binary.description: Copy of CNDH status register, most significant bit is an indicator that the laser timer logic is ready

Field_Binary.name: 58_SE_TX_TEMP
Field_Binary.description: Temperature of the Transmission spectrometer CCD

Field_Binary.name: 59_SE_VIO_TEMP
Field_Binary.description: Temperature of the Violet spectrometer CCD

Field_Binary.name: 60_SE_UV_TEMP
Field_Binary.description: Temperature of the UV spectrometer CCD

Field_Binary.name: 61_SE_TM_TEMP
Field_Binary.description: Temperature of the Transmission spectrometer housing

Field_Binary.name: 62_SE_24_V
Field_Binary.description: 24v monitor on the SE, used to bias CCDs

Field_Binary.name: 63_SE_HVPS_REAR
Field_Binary.description: HVPS read plate voltage monitor

Field_Binary.name: 64_SE_HVPS_CURRENT
Field_Binary.description: HVPS current monitor

Field_Binary.name: 65_SE_HVPS_TEMP
Field_Binary.description: Temperature of the HVPS PCB

Field_Binary.name: 66_NUMBER_OF_COMMANDS_SENT_TO_MU
Field_Binary.description: Number of MU_* commands sent from the BU to the MU

Field_Binary.name: 67_MU_COMMANDS_ACK'D_BY_MU
Field_Binary.description: Number of MU_* commands acknowledged by the MU

Field_Binary.name: 68_MU_COMMANDS_NAK'D_BY_MU
Field_Binary.description: Number of MU_* commands rejected by the MU

Field_Binary.name: 69_MU_PACKETS_RECEIVED_SUCCESS
Field_Binary.description: Number of packets the MU has received successfully

Field_Binary.name: 70_MU_PACKETS_RECEIVED_ERROR
Field_Binary.description: Number of packets the MU has received in error

Field_Binary.name: 71_NUMBER_OF_BU_SPECTRA_READ_OUT_-_NV
Field_Binary.description: Nonvolatile counter of the number of BU spectra read out from the SE

Field_Binary.name: 72_NUMBER_OF_RMI_RECEIVED_FROM_MU_-_NV
Field_Binary.description: Nonvolatile counter of the number of RMI received from the MU

Field_Binary.name: 73_NUMBER_OF_MICROPHONE_RECORDINGS_-_NV
Field_Binary.description: Nonvolatile counter of the number of microphone recordings made

Field_Binary.name: 74_NUMBER_OF_SCIENCE_LASER_SHOTS_COMMANDED_-_NV
Field_Binary.description: Nonvolatile counter of the number of science laser shots commanded

Field_Binary.name: 75_CURRENT_ABSOLUTE_FOCUS_TABLE_POSITION
Field_Binary.description: Nonvolatile absolute focus table position

Field_Binary.name: 76_CLOSE_LIMIT_SWITCH_POSITION_DIFFERENCE
Field_Binary.description: Difference between calculated and actual close limit switch position

Field_Binary.name: 77_FAR_LIMIT_SWITCH_POSITION_DIFFERENCE
Field_Binary.description: Difference between calculated and actual infinity/far limit switch position

Field_Binary.name: 78_CURRENT_AUTOFOCUS_BASELINE_POSITION
Field_Binary.description: Current autofocus baseline position, from which offsets are performed

Field_Binary.name: 79_CURRENT_SPACEWIRE_LINK_0_STATUS_REGISTER
Field_Binary.description: SpaceWire link 0 Leon3FT status, for MU HSS interface

Field_Binary.name: 80_CURRENT_SPACEWIRE_LINK_1_STATUS_REGISTER
Field_Binary.description: SpaceWire link 1 Leon3FT status, for Transmission spectrometer

Field_Binary.name: 81_CURRENT_SPACEWIRE_LINK_2_STATUS_REGISTER
Field_Binary.description: SpaceWire link 2 Leon3FT status, for Violet spectrometer

Field_Binary.name: 82_CURRENT_SPACEWIRE_LINK_3_STATUS_REGISTER
Field_Binary.description: SpaceWire link 3 Leon3FT status, for UV spectrometer

Field_Binary.name: 83_CURRENT_FOCUS_TABLE_POSITION_IN_MM
Field_Binary.description: Focus table position converted to mm

Field_Binary.name: 84_RESERVED
Field_Binary.description: Reserved for future

Field_Binary.name: 85_STATUS_FLAGS
Field_Binary.description: Status Flag bits

Field_Binary.name: 02A_SYS_ERROR
Field_Binary.description: RCE should download diagnostic data, power off and mark SICK

Field_Binary.name: 02B_SEND_EVR
Field_Binary.description: RCE to generate an EVR but let operation continue

Field_Binary.name: 02C_SHUTDOWN
Field_Binary.description: RCE to shutdown instrument but not mark sick

Field_Binary.name: 02D_SUN_SAFE
Field_Binary.description: BU knows that the MU telescope is in a sun-safe condition.

Field_Binary.name: 02E_BU_HVPS_ON
Field_Binary.description: BU HVPS to intensifier on.

Field_Binary.name: 02F_MU_SHUTTER
Field_Binary.description: Status of the MU red/green shutter.

Field_Binary.name: 02G_MU_LASER_ON
Field_Binary.description: MU HVPS to laser is on.

Field_Binary.name: 02H_MU_DC_CHAIN_ON
Field_Binary.description: MU DC/DC supply chain on.

Field_Binary.name: 02I_MU_ON
Field_Binary.description: Power to MU is on.

Field_Binary.name: 02J_CCD_ALMOST_READY
Field_Binary.description: CCDs approaching operating temperature range so turn on MU.

Field_Binary.name: 02K_CCD_READY
Field_Binary.description: CCDs in operating temperature range and ready for use.

Field_Binary.name: 02L_IRS_READY
Field_Binary.description: IR spectrometer in operating temperature range and ready for use.

Field_Binary.name: 02M_LASER_DOUBLER_READY
Field_Binary.description: Laser doubler in operating temperature range and ready for use.

Field_Binary.name: 02N_LASER_STACK_READY
Field_Binary.description: Laser in operating temperature range and ready for use.

Field_Binary.name: 02O_CWL_READY
Field_Binary.description: CWL in operating temperature range and ready for use.

Field_Binary.name: C46_CNDH_PCB_TEMP
Field_Binary.description: Temperature of the CNDH PCB, usually the warmest part of the BU EBOX

Field_Binary.name: C47_CNDH_1_2_V
Field_Binary.description: 1.2v monitor on the CNDH, used for Leon3FT processor core

Field_Binary.name: C48_CNDH_LVPS_TEMP
Field_Binary.description: Temperature of the LVPS PCB

Field_Binary.name: C49_CNDH_3_3_V
Field_Binary.description: 3.3v monitor on the CNDH, main digital supply on CNDH and SE

Field_Binary.name: C50_CNDH_VUI_UV_SPECT_TEMP
Field_Binary.description: Temperature of the reflection spectrometer housing

Field_Binary.name: C51_CNDH_NEG_15_V
Field_Binary.description: -15v monitor on the CNDH, used on SE and HVPS

Field_Binary.name: C52_CNDH_15_V
Field_Binary.description: 15v monitor on the CNDH, used on CNDH, SE, and HVPS

Field_Binary.name: C53_CNDH_1_5_V
Field_Binary.description: 1.2v monitor on the CNDH, used for FPGA core

Field_Binary.name: C58_SE_TX_TEMP
Field_Binary.description: Temperature of the Transmission spectrometer CCD

Field_Binary.name: C59_SE_VIO_TEMP
Field_Binary.description: Temperature of the Violet spectrometer CCD

Field_Binary.name: C60_SE_UV_TEMP
Field_Binary.description: Temperature of the UV spectrometer CCD

Field_Binary.name: C61_SE_TM_TEMP
Field_Binary.description: Temperature of the Transmission spectrometer housing

Field_Binary.name: C62_SE_24_V
Field_Binary.description: 24v monitor on the SE, used to bias CCDs

Field_Binary.name: C63_SE_HVPS_REAR
Field_Binary.description: HVPS read plate voltage monitor

Field_Binary.name: C64_SE_HVPS_CURRENT
Field_Binary.description: HVPS current monitor

Field_Binary.name: C65_SE_HVPS_TEMP
Field_Binary.description: Temperature of the HVPS PCB

Header.name: IR HK HEADER
Header.description: FITS header for IR Housekeeping table

Field_Binary.name: Detector Temp
Field_Binary.description: Temperature measured on the cold face of the detector at the beginning of the spectrum.

Field_Binary.name: RF Power
Field_Binary.description: Power of the generated RF signal measured within the EBOX.

Field_Binary.name: PLL_Lock
Field_Binary.description: 1 if the RF signal is stable in frequency when the acquisition starts

Field_Binary.name: TEC_ready
Field_Binary.description: 1 if the detector temp has reached the set point. 0 if it has not reached the setpoint.

Field_Binary.name: Spectrum DN
Field_Binary.description: Raw digitized detector signal.

Field_Binary.name: Radiance
Field_Binary.description: Raw detector signal converted in radiance using the surface ITF

Field_Binary.name: I_F
Field_Binary.description: Reflectance

Field_Binary.name: I_F_Atm
Field_Binary.description: Reflectance, in which we correct (at a first approximation) the contribution of the atmospheric absorption along the line of sight.

Field_Binary.name: F_sky
Field_Binary.description: Reference spectrum used to compute reflectance

Field_Binary.name: AtmTrans
Field_Binary.description: Atmospheric spectrum used to remove atmospheric residuals

Field_Binary.name: Wavelength
Field_Binary.description: Wavelength at the center of each spectel, corrected for AOTF temperature dependence.

Field_Binary.name: FWHM
Field_Binary.description: Full width half maximum of the AOTF line spead function

Header.name: IR SPEC SOH HEADER
Header.description: FITS header for IR SPEC SOH Table

Field_Binary.name: tablenacc_spectel
Field_Binary.description: ID of the spectel table used to acquire the spectrum.

Field_Binary.name: t_integ
Field_Binary.description: Commanded integration time per spectel. If set to 0, then autoexposure will be enforced.

Field_Binary.name: rfpower_offset
Field_Binary.description: Value of the power offset for AOTF (usually 0).

Field_Binary.name: nacc_offset
Field_Binary.description: Offset number of accumulations in spectro mode or Accumulation Number in scan mode.

Field_Binary.name: hk_t_aotf_init
Field_Binary.description: Temperature measured on the AOTF temperature probe at the bebinning of the spectrum.

Field_Binary.name: meas_conf
Field_Binary.description: Combine two informations: on the least significant byte: the detector (0 for DET1, 1 for DET2); on the next byte the type of acquisition (0=spectrum, 1=scan).

Field_Binary.name: meas_tint
Field_Binary.description: Actual measured integration time per spectel. Only way to know the actual exposure time in case of autoexposure.

Field_Binary.name: meas_tec_setpoint
Field_Binary.description: Temperature measured on the cold face of the detector at the beginning of the spectrum.

Field_Binary.name: hk_t_aotf_end
Field_Binary.description: Temperature measured on the AOTF temperature probe at the end of the spectrum.

Field_Binary.name: hk_t_tec_hot
Field_Binary.description: temperature of the detector TEC, mounted on the backet, at the end of the spectrum.

Field_Binary.name: hk_t_board
Field_Binary.description: Temperature of the IRboard at the end of the spectrum.

Field_Binary.name: ir_detsl
Field_Binary.description: Detector read out: DET1 or DET2.

Field_Binary.name: ir_takem
Field_Binary.description: Type of acquisition: SPECTRUM for raster mode; SCAN for the scan mode.

Field_Binary.name: Saturation
Field_Binary.description: Saturation (bit)

Field_Binary.name: Glitch
Field_Binary.description: Glitch (bit) if set possible Glitch in processing

Field_Binary.name: Spike
Field_Binary.description: Spike (bit) if set spike in data.

Field_Binary.name: StDev
Field_Binary.description: Standard Deviation of the I_F spectrum.
